author: meldsun
content: where I can get ETH on Sepolia? I need a big amount for some experiments. Any link or way to recommend ? Thanks.

author: empir.ether
content: You can claim Sepolia testnet ETH from Alchemy, QuickNode, and Infura faucets

author: sibkatya
content: are you an EthGlobal hacker? They provide some. Not big, but maybe enough

author: mariohavel
content: If you cannot find any, feel free to DM me and I can send you how much you need.

author: mariohavel
content: <@&857649635274915900> and <@&1126618846711795912>, we need your help! We would like to prepare a public FAQ doc for upcoming Pectra upgrade. Ideally this should be a collaborative work so we have will host it in epf.wiki repo. There is a lot of stuff to answer so if you'd like to provide some answers, feel free to open a PR here: https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/protocol-studies/blob/main/docs/wiki/pectra-faq.md
